snippet: Rabbi Barry Freundel is accused of placing a hidden camera in a changing area used by congregants before entering a ritual bath.
abstract: Rabbi Barry Freundel is arrested in District of Columbia on voyeurism charge for allegedly placing hidden camera in changing area of ritual bath at Kesher Israel, prominent Washington synagogue.
lead_paragraph: Rabbi Barry Freundel is accused of placing a hidden camera in a changing area used by congregants before entering a ritual bath.

headline.main: Prominent Rabbi Arrested on a Charge of Voyeurism
headline.print_headline: Prominent Rabbi Arrested on a Charge of Voyeurism
